titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry 80th Anniversary Signature Show: Star Spangled Opry

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing Star Spangled Opry: A Celebration of Our Country, as part of the Grand Ole Opry Eightieth Anniversary Signature Show Series, at the Grand Ole Opry House on July 2.
